headline: Urban Artistry Meets
Timeless Craftsmanship
hero.subheadline: Premium custom tattoos in the heart of North London's creative district
hero.imageAlt: Professional tattoo artist working in modern studio

portfolio.subtitle: Each piece tells a story, crafted with precision and passion

sessions.subtitle: Professional service tailored to bring your vision to life
sessions.guarantee: 100% satisfaction guarantee on all custom work

testimonials.quote: Marcus transformed my rough idea into an absolute masterpiece. The attention to detail and professionalism at South City Market is unmatched.
testimonials.author: Sarah Chen

testimonials.quote: Been to many studios in London, but the quality and atmosphere here is something special. My sleeve turned out better than I ever imagined.
testimonials.author: James Mitchell

paragraphs: Marcus Thompson brings over eight years of tattooing expertise to North London's vibrant creative scene. Specializing in contemporary designs with classical technique, he's built a reputation for transforming personal stories into stunning visual art.

Located in the heart of Caledonian Road's artistic quarter, South City Market serves as both studio and creative sanctuary. Every piece is approached with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring each client leaves with artwork that exceeds their wildest expectations.
about.callout: Every tattoo tells a story - let's craft yours together.
about.imageAlt: Marcus Thompson, lead tattoo artist at South City Market

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We typically book 2-4 weeks in advance for custom work. Small pieces may have earlier availability. Contact us to check current schedule.

items.question: What's included in the session price?
items.answer: All sessions include design consultation, professional tattooing, aftercare kit, and follow-up support. Deposit is applied to final cost.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Create Something Extraordinary?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your consultation today and let's bring your vision to life

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to schedule your consultation.
booking.successMessage: We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment and discuss your design.

footer.tagline: Urban artistry in North London's creative heart
